author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Coroner warns some virus deaths not reported as one third of nursing homes have virus
description: ICU admissions fall for second day as Holohan links rise in cases with increased testing
content:
Almost one third of nursing homes in Ireland have the Covid-19 virus, Hiqa has said. 
The chief inspector of social services with the Health Information and Quality Authority (Hiqa) Mary Dunnion told RTÉ radios Morning Ireland that 118 nursing homes are conf… [+5210 chars]
